column5: I'm in need of four guys to fill a Canadian trip at the end of June.We had four boneheads cancel when it came time to pay the cash. Two of us went to this lake last year. Huge Northerns, lots of walleye and great facilities. This is an outpost camp with manager, cook and hot water. If you're available and interested contact [email protected].
Where are you going and how long,how much???
What week in June are you going? Where and what Camp,Resort,Fly-In are you using? What is the price of the trip? Where are you leaving from to go to the trip?

The dates are 6/22-6/29-02. Going to Chippewyan Lake out of Big Sand Lake outfitters. The cost is $1995.00 from Winnipeg beer and soda extra. Four new guys cancelled and we're trying to fill the trip. Went last year and caught 8 master angler pike and all the walleye we wanted.

I'll see you up there, I'm going to be on LeClair the same week. We had one bonehead cancel too because wifey decided she wanted to go on a cruise. Good moon phase that week, great time of year, we should slay 'em. Good luck.
I've fished that lake and it's fantastic. Maybe you should try the general board too for more exposure.
